title: Sarah Azhari
author: Sarah Azhari
content: Since Advertise on this forum was over, the Administrator find a different way to maximize that top space (visible place) to be a place to present of information about forum and bitcoin.I have observed the forum from the top page thread and found important information that may be newbie doesn't know about that.the kind of information like : satoshi quote, BPIP, Merit, bitcoin and etcexample:Quote"With e-currency based on cryptographic proof, without the need to trust a third party middleman, money can be secure and transactions effortless." -- SatoshiQuoteNo Gods or Kings. Only BitcoinQuoteYou get merit points when someone likes your post enough to give you some. And for every 2 merit points you receive, you can send 1 merit point to someone else!QuoteThe Bitcoin software, network, and concept is called "Bitcoin" with a capitalized "B". Bitcoin currency units are called "bitcoins" with a lowercase "b" -- this is often abbreviated BTC.QuoteQuote"This isn't the kind of software where we can leave so many unresolved bugs that we need a tracker for them." -- SatoshiQuote[BPIP] Bitcointalk Public Information Project - User stats, ranks, reports, web browser extension, and more!QuoteOnce a transaction has 6 confirmations, it is extremely unlikely that an attacker without at least 50% of the network's computation power would be able to reverse it.QuoteActivity + Trust + Earned Merit == The Most Recognized Users on Bitcointalk.... and more,,,the information always changes by time)Thanks to the administrator, moderator, and staff,Â  you really care about us by willingly that space to knowledge.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Bitcoin_Arena has commented about this already, I too have seen many of these in the past, but they are not frequent. I think this is not what we should make a topic about. You already know about the advertisement in the past, you also know that is has been removed and no ads displayed unlike before, you seek no information and it is obvious we all are seeing the ads space to be displaying those recent information which makes this thread not to be necessary.
